title: Madonna logo on "Confessions on a Dancefloor" CD-cover
content:
madoona confessions on a dancefloor, her new cover has a really nice font on it and i was wondering does any one know what is it called, it is the font that is used to spell “madonna” heres a sample of it

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B000B8QEZG/ref=dp\_product-image-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703112945/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B000B8QEZG/ref=dp_product-image-only_0/104-6225930-9186367?%5Fencoding=UTF8&n=5174&s=music "http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B000B8QEZG/ref=dp\_product-image-only\_0/104-6225930-9186367?%5Fencoding=UTF8&n=5174&s=music")
author: bretp
